reviewText:
This one starts off kinda hot, slows down in the middle and picks it up at the end(damn, sounds like how I like it for REAL, LOL).  Better than average character designs, voice work not too bad(English) and the story wasn't paper thin. I didn't dig the head doctor's antics much, but nobody was tortured so it'll pass.

I'm not gonna lie about this one, folks. There are better hentai titles out there, but I definitely wasn't upset about purchasing this one!

From Hentai masters Shiyuuta Biwajima and Chikara Niki (SLAVES OF PASSION/SEX WARD/DEBTS OF DESIRE) comes next installment of the sultry and sweet Vanilla Series! Full of busty nurses and deranged doctors, Hardcore Hospital gives a whole new meaning to the term "intensive care". If nurses were like them in real life I would injured myself on purpose.

If your looking for a good Hentai that involves nurses then "Hardcore Hospital" is where you should look. I thought for its genre it was pretty good and had an intresting story line. I would rate it up there with "Angel of Darkness" series.
This one is good, not rip off hentai.  Good running times and everything!  Buy it!
I think the stories is very good. Hope anybody who likes it. Who like nurses women should buy this. Some parts are pretty good.
This movie was not i expected to be from reading the reviews about it. I watched a couple of times, and i most likely won't watch it again
if hospital nurses are like this I'd like hospitals more. this may give someone some hope when they see a sexy nurses.
I got it for my husband and he seemed to enjoy it. Movie got here before its time. Was a really good buy.
Story line was good. Grafics were very good. It was too short in length. A few more characerters would be very helpful.

Dirty doctors, compliant nurses, ready patients.  Art work isn't bad and translations the same.  Plot is somewhat hackneyed
but there's kinky sex galore.
I did not care for this heartless erotic show. It is mean spirited and not worth watching. Not for me!
The characters were plastic, the action was uninteresting, and the plot did not grab the viewer.  Not a good effort.

Overall, it seemed like every scene or second for that matter was choppy. Not much of a storyline if any. Bout the only thing that was decent or better was the drawing. Delivered as promised with no problems just not worth it for the money and time.

I've seen this movie before on the internet and enjoyed.  So I decided to buy it as a DVD and I enjoyed this as well.  I would have liked it to be a little longer but other wise I would buy another one.
If you like and enjoy anime sex then I say go for it, I did and I am happy that Idid.
good
Really shoty animation and really dumb writing even for hentai. Not unwatchable but not what I would call good. Slightly below average
Not bad for this kind of movie.
Could use more explicite scenes
Story line was  a little out of place i think they cloud have done a better job.
good story line
It was okay but not something that has much replay value in my eyes. The dubs made me laugh my ass off though.
So-So
it was great could have been a little longer
this was alright but could have been better And I was hoping for maybe more than one episode. almost well done
